column5: Heading up for our annual Canadian fishing trip June 14th.  We normally camp at Abram Lake Park but bit the bullet this year and we will be staying in a cabin at Northern Sunrise, just outside the Rice River Sanctuary. Anybody ever stay here before? Looking for some inside info, if possible? Also, is there a good place online to find the latest fishing reports and current water temps for the Abram Lake and Lake Minnitaki area? Any help would be greatly appreciated! Thanks IDOers!
Might want to check out http://www.walleyecentral.com Thereâ€™s a Canadian section
